name: Kazmania 1: Trail of Gems
overview: Dr. DaBadda and his Inkerators are stealing the print from all the books in the land of KazMania and must be stopped before there is nothing lwft to read! Your child will read and understand literature at a higher level, as he or she travels through KazMania with the eccentric sleuth, Mem, to help put an end to DaBadda's plot.
